column5: Fished cooks bay on friday for pike.   Caught this big bass on a husky jerk with a 12 inch steel leader while going for pike! Seemed pretty tired out. The spawn must have done it.  I have other pics but the files are too big to upload apparently. Anyone have any tips to help me upload them?  Thanks

upload them to photo bucket.com And then copy and paste the direct link between And presto.  I went fishing at Sparrow yesterday and cleaned house! I was fishing deep waters and caught some decent bass which means they are off their beds!
